rooms.description: A welcoming space with minimalistic design, adhering to Vastu by positioning the entrance facing north or east.
Open-plan living area adjacent to the central courtyard for natural light and ventilation, with south-facing windows per Vastu recommendations.
Modern kitchen with ample storage, positioned in the northeast to enhance positivity as per Vastu guidelines.
Private bedroom space with sound insulation and natural light from east-facing windows; includes built-in closet for storage, aligned with Vastu.
Functional guest bedroom designed to accommodate occasional visitors; placed towards the northwest area of the apartment.
Modern bathroom with separate toilet area, located in the southwest corner for Vastu compliance.

openings.description: Primary entrance door designed for easy access and alignment with Vastu principles.
Large window ensuring ample natural light into the living room and access to the central courtyard.
Window for enhanced light in the northeast area, adhering to Vastu practices.
Window providing natural light and a view to the courtyard, following Vastu recommendations.
Gateway into the central courtyard offering a seamless flow between indoor and outdoor spaces.

rooms.description: Expansive, open-air terrace designed for relaxation and social gatherings. Features built-in seating and greenery zones, with a skylight opening to allow natural light.

openings.description: Secure access point to the rooftop terrace, ensuring privacy and safety while connecting to the central living areas below.

rooms.description: A small garden or courtyard designed for relaxation and natural ventilation, positioned centrally in the building layout to promote positive energy as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.location: Between adjacent rooms on ground floor
openings.description: Open archway linking the interior spaces to the central courtyard, enhancing natural light and air circulation.
